meanings.definition: Get rid of as no longer useful or desirable.
meanings.sent1: She discards old clothes when they are too small.
meanings.sent2: He discards broken toys to make space for new ones.
meanings.sent3: The cat discards the toy mouse after playing with it.
meanings.sent4: Like a tree shedding leaves, she discards unnecessary clutter.
meanings.sent5: He discards negative thoughts to make room for positivity.

meanings.definition: Items that have been thrown away or rejected.
meanings.sent1: The dumpster was full of discards from the renovation.
meanings.sent2: She found a treasure among the discards at the flea market.
meanings.sent3: The pile of discards turned into a makeshift fort for the kids.
meanings.sent4: His discards became someone else's treasures at the garage sale.
meanings.sent5: The artist created a masterpiece using only discards found on the street.
